QuestData.Title: For Posterity
QuestData.Description: Gundrak looks doomed. You know dis to be true.$b$bIf you be havin' the courage, search for history tablets to see what brought the Drakkari Empire to such an end.$B$BPerhaps one day we be bringin' dem back to der former glory.
QuestData.LogDescription: Chronicler Bah'Kini in Gundrak wants you to collect 6 Drakkari History Tablets.
